aima.core.agent
Interface Action

All Known Implementing Classes:
CellWorldAction, CutOffIndicatorAction, DynamicAction, MoveToAction, NoOpAction, QueenAction
public interface Action

Describes an Action that can or has been taken by an Agent via one of its Actuators.

Author:
Ciaran O'Reilly

Method Summary
 boolean isNoOp()
          Indicates whether or not this Action is a 'No Operation'.
Note: AIMA3e - NoOp, or no operation, is the name of an assembly language instruction that does nothing.
 

Method Detail

isNoOp

boolean isNoOp()
Indicates whether or not this Action is a 'No Operation'.
Note: AIMA3e - NoOp, or no operation, is the name of an assembly language instruction that does nothing.

Returns:
true if this is a NoOp Action.
